data.name: Aethyric Insight
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Aethyric Pandemonium
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters.

data.name: Aethyric Shock
data.description: Overwhelms your opponent with power, inflicting 284 damage and Staggers the target for up to 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Aethyric Ward
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 424 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Apotheosis of Flesh
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters.

data.name: Apotheosis of Mind
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Apotheosis of Spirit
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Backlash
data.description: Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will lash out for 250 Elemental damage over 5 seconds to anyone who hits you.

data.name: Benediction of Morr
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters.

data.name: Benediction of the Dead
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Benediction of Winters
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Blessing of Chaos
data.description: Critical heals will Bless your target for 10 seconds, increasing the power of any heals used on them by 25%.

data.name: Boon of Persistence
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Boon of Tenacity
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Boon of the Impalpable
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Boon of Tzeentch
data.description: Drains 310 health from your target, funneling 150% of the amount drained into your defensive target.

data.name: Breath of Tzeentch
data.description: All opponents within 30 feet of you are knocked back, and monsters are knocked down for 2 seconds.

data.name: By Tzeentch's Will!
data.description: Critical direct heals will increase your morale by 200. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Changer's Touch
data.description: Critical attacks place a debuff on your target that reduces all incoming healing by 50% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Chaotic Agitation
data.description: You channel dark forces into your target and all targets within 30 feet of them, dealing 229 every 2 seconds for up to 6 seconds.

data.name: Chaotic Blur
data.description: Detaunts targets attack power to 50% for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Chaotic Force
data.description: The Critical chance on Tzeentch's Cry, Scourge and Flash of Chaos is raised by 15%.

data.name: Cleanse War Engine
data.description: Siege Targetted cleanse. Removes two siege specific debuffs from a friendly siege engine.

data.name: Cunning Assault
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Evasion
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Stratagem
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Daemonic Fortitude
data.description: Increases target's Wounds by 100 for 60 seconds and then heals the recipient for the amount increased.

data.name: Dark Medicine
data.description: Your target regains 258 health immediately, and then restores an additional 315 health over 5 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Demon Spittle
data.description: Spews a vile mixture over everything 40 feet in front of you, dealing 456 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds to all opponents.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your healing becomes 20% less effective.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Drink Deeply
data.description: Tzeentch's Cordial will now heal an additional 220 health after the effect ends.

data.name: Dust of Pandemonium
data.description: All group members within 100 feet of you are healed for 643.

data.name: Elixir Of Dark Blessings
data.description:
Heals your target for 883 health.
This is a fragile spell, and will always be set back by a large amount if you are damaged while casting it.

data.name: Embrace the Warp
data.description: You embrace the Warp, surrounding yourself with it's power. You will take only 50% damage and your abilities will cost 25% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds. During this time you generate almost no threat, and can not be set back while casting.

data.name: Empowered Alteration
data.description: Leaping Alteration will also restore 48 Action Points over 9 seconds.

data.name: Endless Gifts
data.description: Cooldown on Glimpse of Chaos is reduced by 5s and the cost increased by 15 Action Points.

data.name: Eye of Sheerian
data.description: Increase the armor of all group mates within 100 feet by 1518 and resists by 579 for 10 seconds.

data.name: Favour of the Gods
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Favour of the Mad
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Favour the Daemonic
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%.

data.name: Flash of Chaos
data.description: A burst of chaos that restores 276 health to an ally.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Glimpse of Chaos
data.note: Target must be Cursed or Hexed
data.description: One Curse or Hex is removed by the chaos.

data.name: Harbinger of Doom
data.description:
When this ability is toggled on, you are the Harbinger of Doom, converting your Healing Power, Willpower, and Healing Critical Chance bonuses from items into Magic Power, Intelligence, and Magic Critical Chance.

When this ability is toggled off, you are the Harbinger of Change, converting your Magic Power, Intelligence, and Magic Critical Chance bonuses from items into Healing Power, Willpower, and Healing Critical Chance.

data.name: Harrier's Ken
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Harrier's Pelt
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Harrier's Savagery
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Lashing Waves
data.description: Tzeentch's Lash will now strike all opponents within 20 feet of your initial target.

data.name: Leaping Alteration
data.description: A bolt of healing energy which instantly leaps to allies within 30 feet of the last affected, restoring 153 health over 9 seconds. This effect will only pass through each target once, and will affect up to 6 allies.

data.name: Manipulation
data.description: Any time you directly heal someone, there is a 25% chance your offensive target will take damage equal to 25% of the healed value.

data.name: Mark of Daemonic Fury
data.description:
Increases a groupmember's Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Intelligence by 50. The bearer of this Mark may also activate it like an ability to inflict 234 Corporeal damage.
You may only give a player one Mark, but players may bear multiple Marks of different types at the same time.

data.name: Mark of Remaking
data.description:
The groupmember bearing this Mark can resurrect themselves if killed in the next 10 minutes. In addition, the bearer's Toughness is increased by 80 for 1 hour.
You may only give a player one Mark, but players may bear multiple Marks of different types at the same time.

data.name: Mark of the Spell Destroyer
data.description:
Increases a groupmember's Initiative and Willpower by 50. The bearer of this Mark may activate it like an ability to inflict 552 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.
You may only give a player one Mark, but players may bear multiple Marks of different types at the same time.

data.name: Mark of the Vortex
data.description:
Increases all your groupmember's resistances by 157. The bearer of this Mark may activate it to inflict 342 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds to all targets within 30 feet.
A player may only bear a single Mark at a time, and all of your Marks will fade if you die.

data.name: Mirror of Madness
data.description: Curses your target for 10 seconds so that whenever they cast a direct heal, it inflicts 365 Corporeal damage to them.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Clever
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Cunning
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Dim
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Reinforce War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: You heal the ram for 750 health over the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 Action Points over 3 seconds.

data.name: Rite of Agony
data.description: Pains washes over enemies within 30 feet of you, inflicting 189 Corporeal damage.

data.name: Ritual of Innervation
data.note:
You may only have 1 Ritual active
Requires 5 points in Path of Alchemy
data.description: A frenzied, 30 seconds long ritual that affects all groupmembers within 100 feet, granting them a 20% chance to regain 50 Action Points every attack.

data.name: Ritual of Lunacy
data.note:
You may only have 1 Ritual active
Requires 5 points in Path of Dark Rites
data.description: A dark Ritual lasting 30 seconds that infuses your group with the souls of the fallen, restoring 146 health every 3 seconds to those within 100 feet of the Ritual.

data.name: Ritual of Superiority
data.note:
You may only have 1 Ritual active
Requires 5 points in Path of Witchcraft
data.description: A Ritual of dominance that lasts for 30 seconds, granting group members in the radius a 20% chance when taking damage to active a shield that will absorb 325 damage for up to 10 seconds. Will not trigger more than once every 2 seconds.

data.name: Scourge
data.description: Power lashes out and inflicts 277 Corporeal damage.

data.name: Scourged Warping
data.description: Warp Reality will now deals 10% more damage, and every tick of damage has a 20% chance of making the next Scourge cast within 10 seconds instant cast.

data.name: Shield the Skies
data.description: Ranged siege engines will deal 90% of the normal damage to you. You will also protect two other group mates within 40 feet. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.name: Sky Titan's Bulwark
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Favor
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Strength
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 900 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for a half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Storm of Ravens
data.description: Channeled. Deals 1092 Corporeal damage over 6 seconds. 100% chance to be setback while casting.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: All of your heals will cause enemy monsters to hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Suppressing The Fragile Unbelievers
data.description: You silence disbelievers and inflict 1218 damage over 7 seconds within 30 feet around you.

data.name: Sweeping Disgorgement
data.description: Demon Spittle grows ever more corrosive and now also reduces Armor by 618 and Corporeal resistance by 236.

data.name: Swirling Vortex
data.description: Mark of the Vortex's granted ability will now hit all enemies within 30 feet of the caster, and will last for 15 seconds

data.name: Transference
data.description: While under the effects of your Harbinger of Doom; each time you deal direct damage, your defensive target is healed for 50% of the damage dealt.

data.name: Tzeentch Shall Remake You
data.description: Tzeentch dislikes losing a pawn so soon. Your target is resurrected with 20% health so that Tzeentch may continue his game.

data.name: Tzeentch's Cordial
data.description: Heals your target for 1700 over 15 seconds.

data.name: Tzeentch's Cry
data.description: A quick bolt of power that deals 234 Corporeal damage.

data.name: Tzeentch's Grip
data.description: Direct heals you cast have a 25% chance to create a shield on your target that can absorb up to 475 damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Tzeentch's Lash
data.description: Inflicts 375 Corporeal damage over 4 seconds and silences the target, preventing them from using any magic.

data.name: Tzeentch's Refreshment
data.description: Direct heals have a 25% chance to grant your target 50 AP, but will not restore AP to yourself.

data.name: Tzeentch's Scream
data.description: All groupmates within 100 feet are healed for 1596 health over 15 seconds and regain 25 Action Points every second for 15 seconds

data.name: Tzeentch's Shielding
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet are granted 250 Action Points, and for 20 seconds, everyone will absorb up to 3600 damage.

data.name: Tzeentch's Talon
data.description: Reduces your target's armor by 1320 and all resistances by 504 for 15 seconds.

data.name: Tzeentch's Warding
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.

data.name: Veil of Chaos
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your target will absorb up to 550 damage. When the effect fades they will regain 186 health.

data.name: Warp Reality
data.description: Inflicts 610 Corporeal damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Warped Flesh
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Warping The Spirit
data.description: Each tick of Tzeentch's Cordial has 25% chance to increase target's armor by 1056 for 10 seconds. Additionally, 10% less armor will be bypassed when they are attacked.

data.name: Waves of Chaos
data.description: Rituals will now pulse 150 Corporeal damage to all targets within 30 feet every 3 seconds based on Mastery level of the Ritual.

data.name: Wind of Insanity
data.description:
You securely root yourself in place to call fourth ferocious winds for up to 6 seconds that inflict 172 damage every second to targets within 30 feet of you. The fierce winds will knock back players a short distance without granting them immunity, and will knock down monsters for 2 seconds. Targets cannot be knocked back more than once every 1.5 seconds.
This spell may be toggled off to regain your movement.

data.name: Windblock
data.description: Inflicts 1200 damage to all targets within 30 feet of you, making heals 50% less effective on them for 10 seconds.
